src: “Koro wantiere kod oyiechni ma jo dweche ang'wen mane nitiere kod tuo sukari to koro sani gionge kod tuo no.”
mt: “I want to eat and drink, but I can't because I have diabetes.”
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Laktar Ehud Ur, ngire mar weche thieth e Mbalariany mar Dalhousie ei Halifax, Nova Scottia, kendo jakom mar migao mar klinik kod sayans mar Riwruok mar Tuo sukari ma Kanada nochiwo siem ni nonro no pod nitiere e kindege mag chakruok.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and his team of researchers at the University of Toronto and Canada's National Research Council have developed a new way to detect sugar in blood.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Kaka jomolony moko, en gi chichi koda tuo sukari inyalo thiedhi, kobedo kod ng'eyo, ni nonrogi onge gima medo ne jii man kod tuo sukari mokwongo.
mt: 1. The sugar in your coffee is not good for you, and it is not good for your teeth.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Chieng' Wuoktich, Sara Danius, jagoro ma tene mar Nobel Committee for Literature manitiere ei Swedish Academy, nolando e lela e kinde mane entiere e chenro moro mar nyakalondo mar Sveriges Radio ei Sweden ni komiti, ka ne nyalo mar chopo ir Bob Dylan mondo gikone kwom loch mare mar Nobel Prize ma 2016 mar weche Ndiko Buge otamogi, ne gijok gi kinda mar manye.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, chairwoman of the Nobel Committee for Literature, announced the Swedish Academy's decision to award the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature to Bob Dylan, whose work she described as "poetry for the ear." The decision was made by the five-member Nobel committee, which is part of the Swedish Academy, a body of 18 members that also awards the Nobel Peace Prize.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius ne owacho ni, “gi e sechegi onge gima watimo. Asegoyo simu kendo aseoro barupe mag e-mail ne jal ma otiyo go machiegni kendo aseyudo duoko mamuol ahinya. Gi sani, mago oromo aroma”.
mt: "I was just about to take off. I was about to send an email to the control tower to ask for permission to take off. But I was too late."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Motelo, CEO mar Ring, Jamie Siminoff, nowacho ni kambino nochakore ka okotne mar thigo ne okwinjre gi ei dukane manenitiere er garaj ne.
mt: The company's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, said the company is not responsible for the damage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Noloso olang' mar dhoot matiyo gi WiFi, ne owacho.
mt: 1. The device is connected to the Internet via WiFi.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff nowacho ni nyiepo nomedore tok chopo mare e sula moro achiel e chenro mar Shark Tank e higa mar 2013 kama ne jotelo mag chenrono mar wang' jowi notamore chiwo kony mar omenda ne tijeno.
mt: Siminoff's company was featured on the reality show Shark Tank in 2013, and he was offered a deal by one of the show's investors.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: E giko mag hik 2017, Siminoff ne one e wang' jowi mar nyiewo mwandu mar QVC.
mt: 2017, Simonoff was named one of the 50 most influential people in the world by QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Kambi mar Ring bende nosetieko yuaruok mane gin godo gi kambi ma gipiemgo, ma en ADT Corporation.
mt: The company, ADT Corporation, is the largest security company in the United States.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: E seche ma yath manie tem nenore ni nikod nyalo mar dwoko thoye mag Ebola chien, nyaka gi e sechegi, onge yath mosenyiso ni emaber mar thiedho tuo no.
mt: 3 people have died of Ebola in the last 24 hours, according to the health ministry.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Achiel kwom kwriri mageng'o tuo e del, ZMapp, mokwongo ne nenore ka gima nonyalo konyo ahinya, mak mana ni nonro mag josomo wacho ni en kod ber manok ahinya e geng'o thoye.
mt: The experimental drug ZMapp, which was used to treat two Americans who contracted Ebola in West Africa, is made from tobacco plants. The drug was not available to the Liberian nurse who died.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: E tem mar PALM, Zmapp ne otiyo kaka sigingi, manyiso ni jo sayans ne otiyo kode kaka gir chakruok kendo ne gipimo element mamoko adek go kode.
mt: The PALM, Zmapp and other experimental drugs are all in clinical trials, and scientists are hopeful that they will be effective.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Jotugo mag Gymnastics epiny USA oyie kod barup kamiti United States matayo Olympic, kendo giyie dwaro mar jok matayo Olympic mond okel aluora maber ne jong'wech te.
mt: The United States women's gymnastics team won the gold medal at the 2012 Summer Olympics, ending a 16-year drought.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Wayie kod wach mar jo USOC mar ni dwach jotuk ng'wech mekwa gi kilabu mekgi, kaachiel kod tukegi, nyalo dhi nyime e yo malong'o ka watimo lokruoge mowinjore e riwruok wa, kar mayogi barupegi mag tugo.
mt: The U.S. Olympic Committee has been criticized for its handling of the case, which has been described as a "witch hunt" by some.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Jotug gimnastiks ma USA oyie kod jotim nonro mang'iyo kaka bembo notimre, kaluwore kaka jomanotimnegi wacho, kendo tim nonro yudo kaka Larry Nassar nenyalo timo timni ndalo gi duto, kendo giyie gi paro kod lokruok manyalo bedo maber.
mt: 2018 United States Olympic gymnastics team members Aly Raisman, McKayla Maroney, Gabby Douglas, and Simone Biles, as well as former gymnast and Olympic coach Larry Nassar, were among those who testified.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics kod USOC nikod duaro achiel - loso tuke mag ting'o chumbe mapek, kod mamoko, obed malong'o kaka nyalore ne jotuke mondo giluu lek mekgi e yo makare, mowinjore to kod aluora ma nikod teko mogundho.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have been criticized - for not doing enough, and for doing too much, in the wake of the scandal, which has led to the resignation of the organization's president.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: E higni duto mag 1960, Brzezinski notiyo ne John F. Kennedy kaka ja ng'ad rieko mare kaeto nochak otiyo ne tend apis mar Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: In 1960, Brzezinski advised John F. Kennedy on how to deal with the Soviet Union, and later advised Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: E ndalo yiero ma 1976 nong'ado ne Carter rieko e wi chike matayo gig pinje ma welo, kendo notiyo kaka jang'ad rieko ma en National Security Advisor (NSA) chakre 1977 nyaka 1981, ka nokao tijno kowuok kwom Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, Carter was elected president and appointed Zbigniew Brzezinski as his National Security Advisor (NSA) in 1977 until 1981, replacing Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: kaka NSA, nokonyo Carter eriembo chenro mag tayo piny eyo mamuol, kaka winjruok mar Camp David, 1974; keto ng'iyo mar piny China kod Amerka higa mar 1970, ng'anyo mar loko yor loch ma Iran manolokre geng'o ji kod ang'enge mondo ekawinjgi higa mar 1979, tokod donjo mar Josoviet e piny Afghanistan higa mar 1979.
mt: 1974: Carter meets with Soviet leader Brezhnev at Camp David; 1970: Nixon visits China and the U.S. and the U.S.S.R. visit Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Tuk sinema manoting'o Ryan Gosling kod Emma Stone, noyier kaka tugo maber e kidienje duto madongo.
mt: 2016 film La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, won best picture.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling kod Stone ne oyudo mich mar bedo jotugo mabeyo mar Best Actor kod Best Actress moluwore kaka gin no.
mt: Gosling and Stone were also nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Yiero moko gin picha maber mogik, Jata riwruok, Cinematography, Loso lewni mag sinema, Loso sinema, Score mokuongo, Production Design, Jalma loso duol, Jalma riwo duol kod jasigana mokuongo.
mt: 1. Best Picture, 2. Best Director, 3. Best Cinematography, 4. Best Screenplay, 5. Best Original Score, 6. Best Production Design, 7. Best Actor, 8. Best Actress, 9. Best Supporting Actor, 10. Best Supporting Actress, 11. Best Foreign Language Film, 12. Best Animated Feature Film, 13. Best Documentary Feature, 14. Best Live Action Short Film, 15. Best Animated Short Film, 16. Best Documentary Short Subject, 17. Best Foreign Language Short Film, 18. Best Original Song, 19. Best Original Score, 20. Best Sound Editing, 21. Best Sound Mixing, 22. Best Art Direction, 23. Best Visual Effects, 24. Best Makeup, 25. Best Costume Design, 26. Best Film Editing, 27. Best Original Screenplay, 28. Best Adapted Screenplay, 29. Best Original Drama, 30. Best Original Comedy, 31. Best Original Musical, 32. Best Original Horror, 33. Best Original Fantasy, 34. Best Original Science Fiction, 35. Best Original Western, 36. Best Original War, 37. Best Original Romance, 38. Best Original Thriller, 39. Best Original Mystery, 40. Best Original Action, 41. Best Original Adventure, 42. Best Original Drama, 43. Best Original Comedy, 44. Best Original Musical, 45. Best Original Horror, 46. Best Original Fantasy, 47. Best Original Science Fiction, 48. Best Original Western, 49. Best Original War, 50. Best Original Romance, 51. Best Original Thriller, 52. Best Original Mystery, 53. Best Original Action, 54. Best Original Adventure, 55. Best Original Drama, 56. Best Original Comedy, 57. Best Original Musical, 58. Best Original Horror, 59. Best Original Fantasy, 60. Best Original Science Fiction, 61. Best Original Western, 62. Best Original War, 63. Best Original Romance, 64. Best Original Thriller, 65. Best Original Mystery, 66. Best Original Action, 67. Best Original Adventure, 68. Best Original Drama, 69. Best Original Comedy, 70. Best Original Musical, 71. Best Original Horror, 72.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Wende ariyo moae movie, Temruok (Jomofuwo Maleko) kod Boma Mar Sulwe, ne oyudo puoch koket nying-gi kar wer maber mogik man kod chakruokne. Kar loso wer manyinge Lionsgate noyudo puoch koket nying-gi kuonde 26 - mang'eny moloyo jolos wer duto.
mt: 2009 film The Proposal, starring Sandra Bullock and Ryan Reynolds, was released on DVD and Blu-ray on October 26, 2010.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Jumapili godhiambo, kir ma Amerka Donald Trump kokalo kuom jawuoyo mare, nowacho ni jolweny mag Amerika biro wuok piny Syria.
mt: On Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump announced that he would withdraw U.S. troops from Syria, prompting the resignation of his defense secretary.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Lendono nogol bang' kane Trump nosewuoyo gi kir mar piny Turkey Recep manyinge Tayyip Erdogan e sim.
mt: President-elect Donald Trump has invited Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan to visit the White House.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turkey bende ne onego okaw thuolo mar rito jokedo mag ISIS mane, wachno olero kaka, pinje mag Ulaya osedagi duoko e thuchegi.
mt: Turkey has been bombing ISIS targets in Syria, and has been accused of aiding the Syrian government.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Ma ok hul ahula kende ni moko kuom dinosau ne nitiere kod yier del, thiori ma bende oselandore malach ahinya, to bende ochiwo weche matut ahinya ma choke minono pile ok nyal chiwo, kaka rangi kod kaka nochan dendgi.
mt: The dinosaurs were probably killed by a massive asteroid impact, but the asteroid was not the only cause of their extinction. The asteroid impact caused a global winter, but the dinosaurs were already in trouble because of a long-term trend of global warming.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Josayans wacho ni pien lee ni nerabuor gi malo, to buoye ne ratong' kendo kuar.
mt: The plane was on a training flight, and was not carrying any passengers.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Yuto mar yier dend dinosau no bende hulo medruok e rieko mar timo nonro e wi yore mag lokruok e yier dend winy.
mt: A new dinosaur species was discovered in the Gobi Desert in Mongolia.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Nikech yier dinosa ok nigi dongruok maber mabor miluongoni rachis, togin kod kido moko mag yier buomb miluongo ni — choke okondo — jotim nonro wacho ni rachis chalni en lokruok manobedo achien moloyo kido mamoko-gi.
mt: The dinosaur's tail was long and thin, and — according to the researchers — it was probably used for balance and for swimming.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Kaka bwombegi olosi hulo ni ne ok ti kodgi e huyo, to kar mano nitiyo kodgi e geng'o liet kata koyo. Jotim nonro go ne ochiwo paro ni kata obedo ni ma en iw dinosau mapuot, nonro to hulo mana yier dend dinosau maduong' to ok yier mapiny mar tie nyathi dinosau.
mt: The plane was on its final approach to the airport, when it crashed. The pilot was not injured, but the plane was badly damaged. The pilot was able to walk away from the crash, but the plane was badly damaged.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Jotim nonro nochiwo paro ni, kata obedo ni mae en yiw dinosau mapod puot, ranyisigo to hulo yier dend dinosau maduong' to ok yier mapiny mag mano mapuot.
mt: The team also found a fossilized egg of a dinosaur that lived 100 million years ago, which is the oldest dinosaur egg ever found.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Mbom mitweyo e bwo mtoka mane omwoji e tesend obila maduong' manitiere ei Gaziantep, Turkey nyoro gokinyi ne onego obila ariyo kendo nohinyo marach mokalo jomoko bende ma kwan gi loyo piero ariyo.
mt: 12 people were killed and 35 injured in a car bomb attack in Gaziantep, Turkey on Monday.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Apis mar gavana ne owacho ni ji apar kod ochiko kwom ji mane ohinyore go ne gin obila.
mt: The governor and his entourage were on their way to the airport when the incident occurred.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Obila nowacho ni gichich kod jal milieko ni jalwenj tama mar Daesh(ISIL) ni ema notimo monj no.
mt: 3,000 people have fled the area since the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL) took control of the area.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Negifwenyo ni chieng' bende tiyo mana kaka sulwe: Kaka sulwe duto timre e lwasi wuok kuom rieny margi to kod kaka giluorore kende.
mt: The device is made of a thin sheet of plastic, with a pattern of tiny holes etched into it. The holes are filled with a chemical that binds to a specific protein or other molecule.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Ler kod luor-ruok go itiyogo kanyachiel e manyo namba mar Rossby mar sulwe, manitiere kod tudruok gi mol mar plasma.
mt: The Rossby waves are the result of the interaction of the jet stream with the Earth's magnetic field, and are responsible for the aurora.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Ka namba mar Rossby thwis, tobende ekaka suluwe bende bedo mayomyom kaluwore kod lokruok mar spak.
mt: The Rossby waves are the reason for the jet stream.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: E wuodhe, Iwasaki ne odonje e chandruok e-okenge modhuro.
mt: Iwasaki and his wife were on their way to the airport.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Nokwale gi jo mahundu, guog sudhe nomonje ei Tibet, noringo otony kowuok e keny ei Nepal kendo nomake ei India.
mt: The area is also home to the world's highest peak, Mount Everest, which lies on the border between Nepal and Tibet, and is claimed by India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Rang'iny mar 802.11n tiyo e ondamo duto mag 22.4Ghz to kod 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates in the 2.4GHz to 5.0GHz range.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Maye dhi miyo odonjore kodok chien gi 802.11a, 802.11b kod 802.11g, tek ni tesen mare nitiere kod nyakalondo ariyo.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are the three main standards of wireless local area networks.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Ng'wech mar mbui michiwo kod 802.11n, ni piyo moloyo manolos ma okwongo kod ng'wech man malo mar 600Mbits/s.
mt: 802.11n, which is currently the fastest wireless standard, can reach speeds of up to 600 Mbits/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, mosekendo kod nyithindo ariyo, neok oweyo nyinge kaber, tok loso kod Miller mane stoche ochimre godo.
mt: Duvall, who was 47, leaves behind his wife, two children, and his parents.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Ka ne omiye thuolo mondo ochiw pache, Miller nowacho ni, “Mike wacho thore e seche mag winjo bura. . . Ne atimo ikruok koro ne okawinj gima ne owacho.”
mt: "Mike, I think we're going to crash... I can't see anything. I can't tell where we are," Miller said.
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “Wabiro temo matek mondo waduok chien carbon dioxide mawuok e kidieny ka kidieny mar GDP gi ondamo moromo chuth kochopo higa mar 2020 kowuok e rang'iny mane entiere e hik 2005,” Hu nowacho.
mt: "We will be able to reduce carbon dioxide emissions by 20 percent of GDP by 2020, compared to 2005," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Neok oketo atamalo mar tamruok, kowacho ni ibiroketgi kaluwore kod kaka ochumi mar piny China biro bedo.
mt: The accident occurred during a training flight, and the pilot was the only person on board.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu nojiwo pinje ma pod dongore “mondo owere gi yore machon mag lilo aluora mokwongo kaeto ibiro iyweyo bang'e.”
mt: "The plane was flying at a low altitude when it crashed into the ground," said one witness.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Ne omedoni “ok onego, kata kamano, openjgi mond gikaw tije madhii mokalo kar dongruok margi, ting' margi, to kod nyalo margi.
mt: "We are sorry, we are not sure what happened, but we are sure that the pilot was not at fault, the plane was not at fault, and the runway was not at fault."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Duol mar Iraq Study Group ne ochiwo ripot mare e saa 12.00 GMT kawuono.
mt: 12:00 GMT, the Iraq Study Group released its report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ripodno chiwo siem ni Onge ng'ato ang'ata manyalo singonwa ni okang' moro amora minyalo kaw e piny Irak gi e seche gi biro tieko lwenje matindo, tulo ma medore, kata gik ma miyo ji donjo e tungni.
mt: Reports of a car bomb in Baghdad's Sadr City district have killed at least 10 people and wounded 20 others, according to police.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Ripodno ochakore gi kwayo mar bedo gi twak ma ayanga e weche mag loso winjruok ei Amerka ewi chike midhi ti godo e Yimbo ma Masawa.
mt: Reports of the incident have been spreading on social media in the United States, including Twitter and Facebook.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: ripodno ng'iyo yore duto mag chik mar jotelo kaluore kod kaka omenyo Iraq kendo ukwayo ni mondo olok chikego mapiyo kaka nyalore
mt: 2,000 people have been killed in Iraq since the start of the year, according to the United Nations.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Mokuongo e kind paro mage 78 en ni chenro manyien mar diplomasia onego chaki ka pok higa ni orumo mondo ogeng' tong' mag Iraq ne donjruoge mager kendo mondo olos tudruoge mag diplomasia kod jirende meke duto.
mt: 78 people were killed and 250 injured in a car bomb attack in Iraq, and the government has declared a three-day mourning period.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Seneta ma sani kendo Chi Ker ma Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ne olando chung' mare e laro kom ker nyoro godhiambo ei La Plata, boma ma en kilomita 50 (mail 31) mabor gi Buenos Aires.
mt: Argentine President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner was injured in an explosion at a rally in La Plata, a city about 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Miyo manyinge Kirchner ne olando gombo mare mar chung' ekomb kir mar kar yeng'o ma Argentine, kama ne otiyogo echako siasa mag 2005 mar Senet, kaka jakanyo achiel mar gwenge mag Buenos Aires.
mt: President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner and her husband, former president Néstor Kirchner, were married in 2005 in a civil ceremony in Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Twak ne nikod ywaruok ewi kaka pesa mang'eny otiyo ekonyo jii kod gedo nejoma sunami manyinge Hurricane Katrina nomonjo; ma joma osomo wach pesa moko oseluongo ni chenro mar kir Bush maen “Bush's New Orleans Deal”.
mt: 2 years after Hurricane Katrina, the city of New Orleans is still recovering; and the city's mayor, C. Ray Nagin, is still angry at President George W. Bush's "Bush's New Orleans Deal".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Jo akwede motenore kod wach e wi nuocho mar gedono oseketo pachgi duto e yore ma ichiwogo orak mag nuocho mar gedogo ne jok mawachore ni gin jokanyo mag Wahington.
mt: The incident occurred as the plane was about to land at Washington Dulles International Airport.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Ji maloyo tara ang'wen ne odhi Rumi mondo ne gichopi e liendno.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 injured in a car accident in Rumi, Japan.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: kar kwand Jogo manenitiere nethoth, maneok nyalre mondo jitee oyud donjo eliel, ei St. Peter's Square.
mt: 1,000 people attended the funeral mass at St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Wang' jowi madongo buora ne ogur e kwonde mopogore opogore ei Rumi mondo ne omi ji thuolo mar neno nyasi no.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 injured in a car accident in Rumi, Japan.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: E bombe moko modhuro mag Italy to gi mamoko manitiere e piny mangima, ahinya ahinya ei Poland, bende nokete wang' jowi machalo kamago, mane orangi gi ji mathoth ahinya.
mt: The bomb was made in Italy and was intended for Poland, but was intercepted by the police.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Josom weche machon oseseyo yore mosekalo mag jo FBI mar keto pachgi e tiyo gi mwandu mag tich e kes moko ma tieko yot miwuoro, ahinya ahinya e mtokni mokwal, ka gin gi paro mar medo huma mar kar romb kese ma riwruogno oseloso e yo makare.
mt: The FBI is investigating the incident as a possible hate crime, with the suspect reportedly shouting anti-Muslim slurs at the victims, who were wearing traditional Muslim clothing.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Od Bura Maduong' nochako chiwo omenda ne chenro no mar kedo gi tim mar anjao e hik omenda ma 2005, kendo ne ginyiso achiel kachiel ni FBI nyaka ne ket okwach kich 10 marango weche mag ponografi mar joma dongo.
mt: 2005, the FBI said it had seized more than 10,000 images of child pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa ne oyudo loch mamalo mogik mag mulo kiew, ne oyudo ng'weye 70 kwom opiche 41, ka opichege nomulo kiew mar ang'wen di 11 to kod kiew mar auchiel di 2.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored 70 runs off 41 balls, with 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Jochwad opick kriket gi e kor yamo, Sachin Tendulkar kod Rahul Dravid, ne otugo maber kendo ne giloso ng'weye mia achiel mag riwruok.
mt: 2 of India's most famous cricketers, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, were among the 8 people killed in the crash.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: To, bang' lalo kede manyinge wicket kod jatugo maduong', India ne oringo nyadi 36 kagilalo mana 7 wickets mond tugo orum. .
mt: 36 runs and 7 wickets in 20 overs, India won by 36 runs.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Ker mar piny Amerka George W. Bush nochopo Singapore e okinyi mar tarik 16 Novemba, ka nochako wuoth marabora mar juma achiel ei Asia.
mt: 16 November 2005, U.S. President George W. Bush will visit Singapore, his first visit to Asia since the 2004 presidential election.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Ne omose gi jatelo mar ariyo maduong' mar piny Singapore manyinge Wong Kan Seng, kendo negiwacho weche ohala gi weche neko ekinde kod jatelo mokuongo maduong' mar piny Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: The Prime Minister of Singapore, Wong Kan Seng, and the Prime Minister of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong, were also present.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Bang' joge wito loch e yiero ma diere, Bush ne owuoyo gi jo-winjo kuom weche medruok mar ohala ei Asia.
mt: Bush's visit to the region comes as he seeks to reassure allies about his administration's commitment to the region.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Minista Maduong' Stephen Harper oseyie oro oboke mar piny owacho mar ‘Clean Air Act’ ne kamiti mar duonde duto mondo onone, ka pok osome mar ariyo, tok romo ma Tich Ariyo manokao dakika 25 e kinde gi jatend NDP Jack Layton ei PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper announced the government's intention to pass the 'Clean Air Act' and to reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 25 percent by 2020, as recommended by the NDP's Jack Layton at the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton ne openjo lokruok mar chike mar rito piny saa romo gi PM, ka openjo ni ginuo ndiko malong'o chike mar rito piny.
mt: Layton and his wife were found dead in their home at around 4 p.m. local time, police said.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Nyaka ne Piny Owacho ma Malo kaw ting' mag omenda e od thieth mar Mersey ei boma ma Devonport, Tasmania, piny owacho mar gwenge kod Jo Od Bura moko mag piny owacho ma malo osekwedo timno kaka gino ma ng'uko ikruoge mag yiero mar piny owacho ma malo ma ibi tim kochopo Novemba.
mt: The 2010 Mersey River flood occurred in November 2010, when the Mersey River in Tasmania, Australia, flooded the town of Devonport, causing the evacuation of 3000 people.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Kata kamano, Minista Maduong' John Howard, owacho ni timno ne en mar rito gik tije e od thieth no mondo kik sirikal ma Tasmanian tim negi achaya, kuom chiwo omenda malang' mar AUD$45 milion.
mt: In a statement, Prime Minister John Howard, who is in Tasmania for a state visit, said the government would provide AUD$45 million to the state.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Kaluwore kod wach manodonjo achien, giko pii nam nenyiso ni sunami notimore. Nenitiere timruok mar sunami manofweny, machiegini e aluora mar Pago Pago kod Niue.
mt: The storm is expected to bring heavy rain and high winds to the islands of Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Onge kethruok kata inyruok malich mosewachi e aluora mar Tonga, stima to-nolal ekinde machuok, makendo nomono jotelo man Tonga kuom winjo milome mar sunami, manowuok kuom PTWC.
mt: 1. The tsunami warning for Tonga was issued after a 7.6 magnitude earthquake struck the country, according to the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Sikunde apar kod ang'wen manitiere Hawaii moger but dho nam ne olor e odiechieng' ma Tich Adek duto kata obedo ni siemno ne osegol.
mt: 12 people were injured in a fire that broke out in a Hawaii hotel, but no one was killed.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Ker mar Amerka George W. Bush ne orwako lendo no.
mt: 2001-2009 U.S. President George W. Bush and his wife Laura.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Jawach e loo Bush, Gordon Johndroe noluongo singo mar Korea ma Nyanduat kaka “okang' maduong' mar chopo kare chenro mopuodhi mar golo gik nyuklia ei gul mar Korea.
mt: President Bush, Gordon Johndroe, the White House spokesman, said that North Korea's nuclear test was "a provocative act" and that the United States would work with its allies to respond.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Ahiti manomi nying e tielo mar apar mar kinde mag Atlantic Hurricane, Subtropical Storm Jerry, ne otimore e nam ataro ma Atlantic Ocean kawuono.
mt: 3 Atlantic hurricanes, Subtropical Storm Jerry, and 2 more named storms are in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: National Hurricane Center (NHC) wacho ni gi e seche gi onge luoro ma Jerry kelo ne lowo.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) said Jerry was expected to strengthen.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Injinia mag jolweny mar piny US neparoni inji auchiel mar koth nyalo ketho kute manokethore machon.
mt: The U.S. Navy has been developing a new type of aircraft carrier that would be able to operate in shallow waters.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Gweng' matin mar ochiko, mane oywer kod pii man malo maromo fut 20, kane omonje kod apaka manyinge Hurricane Katrina, sani nikod pi machopo e nungo ka yawo machiegni ne opong' ahinya momuom.
mt: 20 years ago, the city was devastated by Hurricane Katrina, which killed 1,800 people and caused $108 billion in damage.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Pi mol gi e wi ohinga no e kama lach ma romo fut 100.
mt: 100 people were killed in the crash.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Jatelo mar Commons Adam Cuerden nonhulo ich wang' mare e wi wach mar rucho pichni go e kinde mane owuoyo kod jofuambo mag Wikinews.
mt: Commons user Adam Cuerden created this image using the Wikinews logo.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “En [Wales] ne oriambonwa koa chakruok. Mokuongo, kuom wuondruok ka gima maye ne oluwore gi chike mag piny. Mar ariyo, kuom wuondruok ni ne owinjowa, to kare ne orucho gi.”
mt: “In Wales, the weather is always changing. It can be sunny, it can be raining. But it’s always changing.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Ich wang' mar oganda nokelo kinda masani ni mar loso chike matayo chenro mag ndiko weche motenore gi nindruok e mbui moting'o tara mag kembe fwambo gi keyo manitiere kod barupe mag tich.
mt: The plane was carrying 12 crew members and 114 passengers, including 10 foreigners.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Tijno thothne notime mana e yor weche milieko kata thiori, mak mana ni programno to nondiki mondo okop duoko mar nonro manotim kwom galaksi mar Sagittarius.
mt: The team found that the galaxy's stars are older than previously thought, and that the galaxy's formation was not as smooth as previously believed.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Lokruok mane tim manyo, ninyalo kel kod teko mag ywaruok ekind gima iluongo ni galaxy's dark matter kod Milky way dark matter.
mt: The Milky Way's dark matter is not the same as the galaxy's dark matter.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Mana kaka dwe tiyo gi tekrene mar ywayo gikmoko e pinyni, mamiyo nam dhi kwath, e kaka Milky Way bende tiyo gi tekrege kwom galaksi mar Sagittarius.
mt: The Milky Way galaxy is one of the largest structures in the known universe, containing hundreds of billions of stars.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Josayans ne ong'ado wach niya, gigo marateng' tungo gigo marateng' mana kaka gikmoko tee timo.
mt: The plane was on a training mission.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Puonjno wacho ni thoth gik ma rotenge molworo galaksi oketi molworo galaksi ka tere mar ler, kendo olosgi gi kite matindo tindo.
mt: The galaxy is moving away from us at a rate of 600 kilometers per second.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Duoko mege tivi nyiso ni nitie iro marachar mawuok e yien-no
mt: 2 people were injured in the incident.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Loch mag gwengego chiwo siem ne jok modak but tesen mar teko mag nyukliano mondo obed e udi, gilor masindegi mag kelo ng'ich gi liet e udi, kendo kik mondo gimodh pi mowuok e freji.
mt: 3 people were killed and 2 were injured when a truck carrying them crashed into a bridge.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Kaluwore kod Jo Japan marango weche nyukliya, kisefwenyo gino manyalo muoch maen caesium, kod iodine e kar tich.
mt: The Japanese government has ordered the evacuation of residents within a 20-kilometer radius of the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant, after a spike in radiation levels.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Jotelo mag sirkal lieko ni mano nyalobedo ni nyiso ni depe moting'o mo mar uranium manitiere ee kambino osebarore kendo koro gichwero mo no oko.
mt: The plant is expected to produce 1,000 tons of uranium per year, and will be the first of its kind in the country.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Laktar Tony Moll, nofwenyo kahera mar Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) ei gweng' mar KwaZulu-Natal e Afrika ma Milambo.
mt: 28-year-old Tony Moll, who was diagnosed with Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, in 2006.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Ei twak gi jafwambo, ne owacho ni lokruok manyien no “ne en makelo chandruok kendo malich ahinya nikech en kod kwan mamalo mar thoe”.
mt: The accident happened as the pilot was about to land, and the airport's fire truck was responding to the scene.
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Jotuo moko oyudo tuono e kar thieth, laktar manyinge Moll paro kamano, kendo jii ariyo ei jogo negin jotich ma kar thieth kanyo.
mt: The plane was on a training flight, carrying 12 crew members, including two pilots, when it crashed.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
